name: Inky (Figus)
description:
Inky for Metroidvania Month 18 Game Jam

It's my first game I made. Also first time I learn unity. It's short and and simple. After many problems I must cut off 70% of planned content but as my first project I'm quite satisfied how it came out after all. I hope you'll like it and hope that all experience I get during this project will help me improve my next ones.

Idk what to say more, let me know how you like this game, what should I do better or what I did well.

GameON!

Controls: Keyboard
  • WSAD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Interact
Gamepad (should work)
  • Left Analog - Movement
  • A(XBox) /  X(PS) - Jump
  • Y(XBox) / Tringle(PS) - Interact

All assets are created by me.

Special thanks to SaikingS for substantive assistance.
